    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AsciiImage​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bimg)
      Instantiates an AsciiImage at normal scale and tries to adjust for vertical stretching.
      AsciiImage​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bimg, double scalex, double scaley)
      Instantiates an AsciiImage at specified scale and tries to adjust for vertical stretching.
      AsciiImage​(java.awt.image.BufferedImage bimg, double scalex, double scaley, boolean adjust_for_stretching)
      Instantiates an AsciiImage at specified scale and whether or not to adjust for vertical stretching.
